column2: A superhero is a person who does heroic deeds and has the ability to do them in a way that a normal person couldn't.

column1: what are some examples of superpowers
column2: Some cool superpowers include flight, immortality, invisibility, telepathy, teleportation and, super speed!

column1: how can i turn into a superhero
column2: 1 - Turn your misfortune into an origin story, 2 - Beware of your weakness, 3 - Overcome your fears, 4 - Beware of your nemesis!

column1: what are some qualities of a superhero
column2: Superheroes are courageous, have strong moral codes, are tolerant to pain, have a good fighting spirit, and a great sense of responsibility.

column1: who are the most powerful superheroes
